mapper.select: SELECT car_model_code, car_model_name, cm_writer,cm_date FROM car_model_tb

SELECT customer_car_info_code AS customerCarInfoCode ,customer_code AS customerCode ,customer_car_number AS customerCarNumber ,car_production_year AS carProductionYear ,customer_car_info_date AS customerCarInfoDate ,customer_car_info_writer AS customerCarInfoWriter ,last_visit_date AS lastVisitDate ,last_distance_driven AS lastDistanceDriven ,car_registration_date AS carRegistrationDate FROM customer_car_info_table WHERE customer_car_info_code = #{carUpList};
SELECT cm.* FROM color_midcate_tb cm inner JOIN color_bigcate_tb cb ON cb.color_big_code = cm.color_big_code WHERE cb.color_big_code = #{bigColSm}
SELECT cb.* FROM color_bigcate_tb AS cb inner JOIN car_model_tb AS cm ON cb.car_model_code = cm.car_model_code WHERE cb.car_model_code = #{carModelSm}
SELECT og.* FROM option_grade_tb AS og INNER JOIN year_car_tb AS yc ON og.year_car_code = yc.year_car_code WHERE og.year_car_code = #{yearCarSm}
SELECT fe.* FROM fuel_engine_tb AS fe INNER JOIN fuel_tb AS fl ON fe.fuel_code = fl.fuel_code WHERE fe.fuel_code = #{engineSm}
SELECT fu.* FROM fuel_tb AS fu INNER JOIN option_grade_tb AS og ON fu.option_grade_code = og.option_grade_code WHERE fu.option_grade_code = #{opGradeSm}
SELECT yc.* FROM year_car_tb AS yc INNER JOIN car_model_tb AS cm ON yc.car_model_code = cm.car_model_code WHERE yc.car_model_code = #{carModelSmVal} AND yc.car_model_name = #{carModelSmText}

SELECT cm.* FROM car_model_tb AS cm INNER JOIN car_class_tb AS cc ON cm.car_class_code = cc.car_class_code WHERE cm.origin_code = #{originCode} AND cm.vendor_code = #{vendorCode} AND cm.car_class_code = #{carClassCode}
SELECT * FROM car_class_tb AS cc INNER JOIN vendor_tb AS vd ON cc.vendor_code = vd.vendor_code WHERE vd.origin_code = #{originCode} AND cc.vendor_code = #{vendorSm}
SELECT v.vendor_code, v.origin_code, v.vendor_name FROM vendor_tb AS v INNER JOIN origin_tb AS o ON v.origin_code = o.origin_code WHERE v.origin_code = #{originSm}
